'''''Amon Hen'' 222''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-second issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[March]] [[2010]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen222.jpg|Houses of Healing]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* Obituary: David Storr Unwin (David Severn)
** By: Jessica Yates
* Advertisement: Moreton-in-Marsh exhibition
* AGM Announcement
* Advertisement: Festival in the Shire
* Advertisement: [[The Tolkien Professor]]
** By: Ethan Smith
* Booking for the 2010 Tolkien Society Seminars
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s use of the word "Waver..."
** By: Chris McArthur
* A Worthy Memorial (+ request for website help)
** By: Liz Stephen
* Artwork: ''Eldarion''
** By: Jef Murray
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Letters
* [[Celeborn]]'s Conundrum Answers
** By: Jordan Stewart
* Poem: ''The Ballad of [[Fredegar Bolger]]''
** By: Julia Sinclair
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards ~ Tuilinde
* Review: ''The Habit of Art''
** By: Jessica Yates
* Review: ''[[The Epic Realm of Tolkien|The Epic Realm of Tolkien - Part One]]''

* Artwork: ''The Green Dragon Inn, Bywater''
** By: Colin Williams
* Around the World in 80(?) Societies
